#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	char string[20003];
	int i,j;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,k;
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
		scanf("%s",string);
		int ans=0;
		int flag=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;)
		{
			char val=string[i];
			int count=0;
			while(val==string[i+count] && i+count<n)
				count++;
			i=i+count;
			ans=ans+(count/k);
			if(count>=k)
				flag=1;
			if(count%k!=0)
				ans+=1;
		}
		if(flag==0)
			cout<<-1<<endl;
		else
			cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
